verses.verse: Then he brought me <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> which <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>; and it was <S%H5462>shut<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H8179>me<s%>; This gate shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%>, it shall not be <S%H6605>opened<s%>, and no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> in by <S%H3068>it<s%>; because the Lord, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, has <S%H935>entered<s%> in by <S%H5462>it<s%>, therefore it shall be shut.

It is for the <S%H5387>prince<s%>; the <S%H5387>prince<s%>, he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> in it to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by the way of the <S%H1870>same<s%>.

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>: and I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H3519>and<s%>, behold, the glory of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>mark<s%> <S%H3820>well<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> with your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%> all that I <S%H1696>say<s%> unto you concerning all the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and all the <S%H8451>laws<s%> <S%H7760>there<s%>; and mark <S%H3820>well<s%> the entering <S%H3996>in<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, with every going <S%H4161>forth<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>.

And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%>, even to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; O you <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> you of all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>,

In that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> into my sanctuary <S%H1121>strangers<s%>, <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, to be in my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, to <S%H2490>pollute<s%> <S%H1004>it<s%>, even my house, when you <S%H7126>offer<s%> my <S%H3899>bread<s%>, the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and they have <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H413>because<s%> of all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

And you have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my holy <S%H6944>things<s%>: but you have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of my <S%H4931>charge<s%> in my sanctuary for <S%H4720>yourselves<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; No <S%H1121>stranger<s%>, <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>, nor <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, of any stranger that is <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that are gone away <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3478>me<s%>, when Israel went <S%H8582>astray<s%>, which went astray <S%H8582>away<s%> from me <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%>; they shall even <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

Yet they shall be <S%H8334>ministers<s%> in my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, having <S%H6486>charge<s%> at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H8334>ministering<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%>: they shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them to minister unto <S%H8334>them<s%>.

Because they <S%H8334>ministered<s%> unto them <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols<s%>, and caused the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4383>fall<s%> into <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; therefore have I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H5002>them<s%>, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

And they shall not come <S%H5066>near<s%> unto <S%H3547>me<s%>, to do the office of a priest unto <S%H5066>me<s%>, nor to come near to any of my holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, in the most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5375>place<s%>: but they shall bear their <S%H3639>shame<s%>, and their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed<s%>.
But I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> <S%H6213>there<s%>, and for all that shall be done in it.

But the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%>, that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%> from <S%H7126>me<s%>, they shall come near to me to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H5975>me<s%>, and they shall stand <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto me the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>:

They shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>, and they shall come <S%H7126>near<s%> to my <S%H7979>table<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H8104>me<s%>, and they shall keep my <S%H4931>charge<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H935>pass<s%>, that when they enter in at the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, they shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>; and no <S%H6785>wool<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> upon <S%H8334>them<s%>, while they minister in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, and <S%H1004>inside<s%>.

They shall have <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H6287>caps<s%> upon their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, and shall have <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H4370>underwear<s%> upon their <S%H4975>body<s%>; they shall not <S%H2296>clothe<s%> themselves with any thing that causes <S%H3154>sweat<s%>.

And when they go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, even into the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>, they shall put <S%H6584>off<s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> where they <S%H8334>ministered<s%>, and <S%H3240>lay<s%> them in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, and they shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>; and they shall not <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with their <S%H899>garments<s%>.
Neither shall they <S%H1548>shave<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%>, nor allow their <S%H6545>locks<s%> to grow <S%H7971>long<s%>; they shall <S%H3697>only<s%> <S%H3697>shear<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%>.
Neither shall any <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>, when they <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>.

Neither shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> for their <S%H802>wives<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%>, nor her that is put <S%H1644>away<s%>: but they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1330>maidens<s%> of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, or a <S%H490>widow<s%> that had a priest <S%H3548>before<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the difference between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H2455>profane<s%>, and cause them to <S%H3045>discern<s%> between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%>.

And in <S%H7379>controversy<s%> they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in <S%H8199>judgment<s%>; and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> it according to my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>: and they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H8451>laws<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> in all my <S%H4150>assemblies<s%>; and they shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>.

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> at no <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H120>person<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H1>themselves<s%>: but for father, or for <S%H517>mother<s%>, or for <S%H1121>son<s%>, or for <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, for <S%H251>brother<s%>, or for <S%H269>sister<s%> that has had no <S%H376>husband<s%>, they may defile <S%H2930>themselves<s%>.
And <S%H310>after<s%> he is <S%H2893>cleansed<s%>, they shall <S%H5608>reckon<s%> unto him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, unto the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

And it shall be unto them for a <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: I am their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: and you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them no <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: I am their <S%H272>possession<s%>.

They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, and the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>; and every dedicated <S%H2764>thing<s%> in Israel shall be <S%H3478>theirs<s%>.

And the <S%H7225>first<s%> of all the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of all <S%H8641>things<s%>, and every oblation of <S%H8641>all<s%>, of every sort of your oblations, shall be the <S%H3548>priest<s%>'s: you shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%>, that he may cause the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%>.
The <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of any thing that is dead of <S%H5038>itself<s%>, or <S%H2966>torn<s%>, whether it be <S%H5775>bird<s%> or <S%H929>animal<s%>.
